text: @guyverhofstadt Thanks for supporting us! During such serious #COVID19 pandemic, the horrible puppet govt w #CCPChina still put lots of effort to jeopardize the real #Hongkongers, we need genuine democracy , freedom n justice, we need u all to #StandwithHK Pls keep supporting us #StaySafe
